llama2_direct_sole-planning_results:
Day 1 (March 6th): Richmond to Houston

* Depart from Richmond at 8:27 AM
* Arrive in Houston at 10:43 AM (duration: 3 hours, 16 minutes)
* Check-in at a hotel in Houston (e.g., Holiday Inn Express & Suites Houston Downtown)
* Explore the city and have dinner at a Chinese restaurant (e.g., Happy Buddha)

Day 2 (March 7th): Houston

* Breakfast at a local café
* Visit Space Center Houston and have lunch at a food truck (e.g., The Melt)
* Explore the city and have dinner at an Indian restaurant (e.g., Taste of India)

Day 3 (March 8th): Houston to Texarkana

* Depart from Houston at 17:56 PM (duration: 1 hour, 4 minutes)
* Arrive in Texarkana at 19:00 PM (duration: 3 hours, 11 minutes)
* Check-in at a hotel in Texarkana (e.g., Red Roof Inn & Suites Texarkana)
* Explore the city and have dinner at a Chinese restaurant (e.g., China King)

Day 4 (March 9th): Texarkana

* Breakfast at a local café
* Visit the Texarkana Museum System and have lunch at a food truck (e.g., The Funky Taco)
* Explore the city and have dinner at an Indian restaurant (e.g., India Palace)

Day 5 (March 10th): Return to Richmond

* Depart from Texarkana at 10:43 AM (duration: 4 hours, 8 minutes)
* Arrive in Richmond at 16:27 PM (duration: 16 hours, 8 minutes)
* Check-in at a hotel in Richmond (e.g., Hyatt Place Richmond)

Total cost for the trip: $5,903.40

Note: The above itinerary is just a suggestion and can be customized based on your preferences and schedule. Also, please note that the flight schedules and availability may change, so it's best to check with the airlines for the most up-to-date information.
